trans-unit.source: Represents a membership condition that matches all code.
trans-unit.target: 表示与所有代码匹配的成员条件。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: This membership condition is usually used on the root code group of a policy level so that the policy applies to all code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员资格条件通常使用根代码组的策略级别上，以便将策略应用于的所有代码。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.AllMembershipCondition" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.AllMembershipCondition" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The evidence set against which to make the test.
trans-unit.target: 证据集，将根据它进行测试。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified evidence satisfies the membership condition.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的证据是否能满足成员条件。

trans-unit.source: Always <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 总是为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: All code is a match for <xref:System.Security.Policy.AllMembershipCondition>, so <xref:System.Security.Policy.AllMembershipCondition.Check%2A> always returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 所有代码都是的匹配项<xref:System.Security.Policy.AllMembershipCondition>，因此<xref:System.Security.Policy.AllMembershipCondition.Check%2A>始终返回`true`。

trans-unit.source: Creates an equivalent copy of the membership condition.
trans-unit.target: 创建成员条件的等效副本。

trans-unit.source: A new, identical copy of the current membership condition.
trans-unit.target: 当前成员条件的完全相同的新副本。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare to <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.AllMembershipCondition" />.
trans-unit.target: 要与 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.AllMembershipCondition" /> 比较的对象。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified membership condition is an <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.AllMembershipCondition" />.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的成员条件是否为 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.AllMembershipCondition" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified membership condition is an <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.AllMembershipCondition" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的成员条件是 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.AllMembershipCondition" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: 通过 XML 编码重新构造具有指定状态的安全对象。

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.
trans-unit.target: 用于重新构造安全对象的 XML 编码。

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: 通过 XML 编码重新构造具有指定状态的安全对象。

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.
trans-unit.target: 用于重新构造安全对象的 XML 编码。

trans-unit.source: The policy level context used to resolve named permission set references.
trans-unit.target: 用于解析命名的权限集引用的策略级别上下文。

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: 通过 XML 编码重新构造具有指定状态的安全对象。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="e" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> 参数为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="e" /> parameter is not a valid membership condition element.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> 参数不是有效的成员条件元素。

trans-unit.source: Gets the hash code for the current membership condition.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前成员条件的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: The hash code for the current membership condition.
trans-unit.target: 当前成员条件的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a string representation of the membership condition.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回成员条件的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: A representation of the membership condition.
trans-unit.target: 成员条件的表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state.
trans-unit.target: 创建安全对象及其当前状态的 XML 编码。

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state.
trans-unit.target: 创建安全对象及其当前状态的 XML 编码。

trans-unit.source: An XML encoding of the security object, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: 安全对象的 XML 编码，包括任何状态信息。

trans-unit.source: The policy level context for resolving named permission set references.
trans-unit.target: 用于解析命名的权限集引用的策略级别上下文。

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state with the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.PolicyLevel" /> 创建安全对象及其当前状态的 XML 编码。

trans-unit.source: An XML encoding of the security object, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: 安全对象的 XML 编码，包括任何状态信息。
